title: Inside the Garden Chambers Atelier
author: Max Juma
excerpt: Step into our Nairobi studio and see how master tailors cut, hand-finish, and press every bespoke suit that leaves our doors.

title: Bespoke Wedding Style for Kenyan Couples
author: Sarah Njoroge
excerpt: From coastal ceremonies to city cathedrals, discover custom suit fabrics, lapel choices, and finishing touches that elevate the big day.

title: Seasonal Fabrics Perfect for Nairobi Weather
author: Adrian Kamau
excerpt: We break down breathable blends, luxurious wools, and bold African prints that keep you polished from April showers to December heat.
